text: Hernandia beninensis is a species of plant in the Hernandiaceae family. It is endemic to São Tomé and Príncipe and is listed as near threatened by the IUCN. ==References== Category:Hernandiaceae Category:Near threatened plants Category:Endemic flora of São Tomé and Príncipe Category:Taxonomy articles created by Polbot
title: Hernandia beninensis
